**Needed Candidate**  
[Needed candidate â€“ remote helpers blog (rh-s.com)](http://blog.rh-s.com/needed-candidate/)

We fill out a Needed **Candidate** card as soon as we receive a request from a lead for a particular specialist.

![][image1]

- In the Leads tab, select the desired lead  
- Then open the **Needed Candidate** tab and fill in the fields with the available information:  
* Department \- choose a department  
* Position \- specialty  
* Client Needed Skills \- What skills the required employee should have (if needed)  
* Client Needed Status:

Required \- if we have one  
Hunting  \- looking for  
Demand \- if the client doesn't need anyone and was just interested in these items  
Closed \- If the client says he doesn't need any employees  
Hired \- when the client has hired an employee  
Candidate \-  when a suitable candidate has been matched and found

* Demanded date \- choose current date  
* Note \- making notes on the lead's request. **For example**: *This lead is interested in App developers.*

**Don't forget to change the status from Send Request \- Needed Candidate**

![][image2]
